title: Can't log in to IdM Admin Portal after upgrade
content:
The suite admin can't log in to IdM Admin Portal (https://<External_Access_Host>/idm-admin) if the suite is upgraded from a version earlier than 2019.05 and the IdM signing key in Suite Administration has been changed, a 503 error occurs.

Cause

The signing key isn't updated in the idm-config config map.

Solution

  1. Log in to the control plane node or bastion node as root or a sudo user.
  2. Run the following command to update the config map: 
    kubectl patch configmap/idm-config -n <suite_namespace> -p '{"data":{"idm_token_signingkey":"{\"itom-bo\":\"idm_token_signingkey_secret_key\"}","idm_token_signingkey_for_read": "idm_token_signingkey_secret_key itom-bo"}}'
